snippet: Mr. Slim won five times in World Series of Poker events and was elected to at least four gambling halls of fame.
abstract: Amarillo Slim, a Texas-based poker champion who became the public face of the game as it rose to prominence on television and the Internet, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Slim won five times in World Series of Poker events and was elected to at least four gambling halls of fame.

headline.seo: Amarillo Slim, Five-Time Poker World Series Winner, Dies at 83
headline.main: Amarillo Slim, Gambler With a Sly Wit, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Amarillo Slim, Gambler With a Sly Wit, Dies at 83
